title: Can't open League of Legends
body:
Hey guys,

I cannot open League of Legends I even fully reinstalled my computer, vga driver , firewall off , everything and it's still not working R.I.P.
Can  Someone help me?

replies.body: What do you experience when you try to open it and are you using the Legacy client or the Beta Client?

im having the same problem, im trying to open a fresh install of league of legends, nothing happens. If i do nothing after about 30 mins a message pops up saying  BugSplatRC resource DLL not found. Ive made a support ticket but have still not gotten a solution.
